import React from "react" import {Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid} from "@material-ui/core" import CountUp from "react-countup" //for increasing numbers grphically import cx from "classnames" import styles from "./Cards.module.css" const Cards = ({data:{confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate}}) => { if(!confirmed){ return "...Loading..." } return(
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active cases of COVID-19 Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of recoveries from COVID-19 Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of deaths caused by COVID-19
) } export default Cards;
